clinical_study.brief_title: The Influence of Antibiotics on the Incidence of Biliary Tract Infections After PTCD for Malignant Obstructive Jaundice
clinical_study.official_title: The Influence of Antibiotics on the Incidence of Biliary Tract Infections After PTCD for Malignant Obstructive Jaundice

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the influence of antibiotics on the incidence of biliary tract infections after PTCD for malignant obstructive jaundice.

detailed_description.textblock: This project designed a large-scale, single-center, prospective randomized controlled clinical trial to explore the impact of antibiotics on the incidence of biliary tract infections after PTCD with malignant obstructive jaundice. This study will provide evidence-based medical evidence for the need for routine use of antibiotics to prevent biliary tract infections after PTCD with malignant obstructive jaundice, and provide references for clinicians to prevent patients from PTCD infections.
